sections: We’ve heard folks say they want to subscribe to
, but the price is a bit too high. So today only, we are offering a special limited-time discount:

(that’s under 60 cents a week, if you’re doing the math), our lowest price ever. When you become a paying subscriber, you are directly funding necessary journalism that holds the powerful accountable - and you get tons of exclusive stuff.

We’re offering this discount because we refuse to price anyone out, especially at a time when we are all being terrorized by a tough economy, a corrupt political system and a radicalized Supreme Court. It feels as though the 20th century itself is being re-litigated and overturned before our very eyes.

We’ve been doing our part to fight back: We’ve been exposing the dark money and corruption that corporate media refuses to report on. And our reporting has made a real impact. But we cannot do it without reader support. We need you on our team. It's go time!
Remember: When you become a full subscriber you get access to additional newsletters, our premium podcast, subscriber-only live events,
If you do not use this discount, we still thank you for being a reader and we sincerely hope you will continue reading and sharing
